doc.name: TimeTriggeredEncoderHandler
doc.description:
A class for TimeTriggeredEncoderInputDevice that uses GPIO pins on the Luminary board.

This actor will have no effect in model simulations, but allows for code generators to generate the actors. FIXME: the logic of this actor should be implemented for model simulation also.
doc.author: Jia Zou
doc.port: The input port. This base class imposes no type constraints except that the type of the input cannot be greater than the type of the output.
